rows.label: qev012201_MSG0001
rows.name: Wait.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0002
rows.name: Waaaaait wait wait...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0003
rows.name: No way. Is that YOU, Chief?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Working all the way out here in Sylvalum, are you?
Man, this place is some trip.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0005
rows.name: Me? Oh, I'm out here adventuring as usual![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Problem is, my Skell took fire on the far side
of the lake up ahead and just conked out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0007
rows.name: This caravan was nice enough to take me in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev012201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Mia who was firing at her.

rows.label: qev012201_JNK0020
rows.name: Suspect

rows.label: qev012201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Mia how she was able to obtain a Skell.

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0008
rows.name: Hmmmmm. You know, that's a good question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0009
rows.name:
I honestly don't know. I was just walking around,
all stomp-stomp-stomp, when someone decided
to snipe my poor Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0010
rows.name:
They took out a leg, so I bailed out and
made it here on foot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0011
rows.name: Right? They're WAY too expensive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0012
rows.name: Um... Can you keep a secret?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0013
rows.name:
There was one in a maintenance hangar back
at HQ, and so I kinda...volunteered it for an
unplanned field test?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0014
rows.name: Authorized by...me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0015
rows.name: Okay, so I kiiind of just took it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0016
rows.name:
Enemy ambush notwithstanding, I'M not hurt.
I could head home whenever I want to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0017
rows.name: But I'd feel bad abandoning the Skell, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0018
rows.name:
These little Nopon here have offered their help,
but fortunately the damage isn't THAT bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Honestly, I could probably fix it myself.
I mean, I AM a mechanic, after all.
But first, I'm gonna need some parts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0020
rows.name: The caravan has a few in stock, but not enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Which, um...brings us to the request portion
of our program.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Is there any way I could ask you to gather the
remaining parts I need for the repairs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0023
rows.name:
I mean, it's gotta be fate that we met here!
Can't go against fate, right? ...Riiiight?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_JNK0030
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev012201_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree to help Mia.

rows.label: qev012201_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev012201_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Mia you can't help her.

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0024
rows.name: Really? Augh, you're SO nice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0025
rows.name:
My dream is to one day become a real BLADE
operative like you, Chief. Did you know that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0026
rows.name:
Honest! That's not just flattery. I'd actually dream of
BEING you if it wasn't slightly disturbing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0027
rows.name:
But you're strong! And kind! And reliable!
And that's what I aspire to be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Aw, come on! You already sat through that loooong
explanation, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0029
rows.name:
What's a little more effort between friends?
So come on. I need this, Chief. I NEED it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Plus, I heard BLADEs all treat each other like family,
even when competing for an assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0031
rows.name:
Granted, I'm not on an assignment. Or even
an actual BLADE member...yet. But still![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0032
rows.name:
Plus, as my mentor-slash-role-model,
don't you owe it to your protégé?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0033
rows.name: Pleeease! I'm begging you here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0034
rows.name: Heeeeey, welcome back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0035
rows.name: Find those parts for me, Chief?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0036
rows.name:
Not to spin this totally banal favor into
something grander, but, uh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0037
rows.name:
Maybe you can consider this an opportunity
to get to know this mysterious land better!
Uh...yeah. Thanks in advance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0038
rows.name: Welcome back, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0039
rows.name: How's the hunt for those Skell parts going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0040
rows.name:
Thank you SO, so much. Now I can get the
repairs done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0041
rows.name: Next stop, my Skell. Time to hit the road![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0042
rows.name:
Er, but please don't make me go back there alone.
There could be enemies and junk running around,
and I'm sure all of them would want me dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0043
rows.name: You don't mind playing bodyguard, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0044
rows.name:
I promise I'll have my ride patched up in no time.
It'll be a walk in the park![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0045
rows.name: Now, come on. Time's a-wastin'![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012201_MSG0046
rows.name: Off we go![ST:wait ]
